attributes.action: Conditions for Scotland leaving the Union
attributes.additional_details:
For information to be made public throughout the UK of the total tax revenues generated in Scotland in the last 3 years, the total revenues to the government from oil interests in Scotland in the last three years and the subsidies from the rest of the UK to Scotland in the last three years.
Furthermore, for there to be a clear condition of Scotland leaving the Union of no further subsidies from the rest of the UK
